transcript:
Customer: Hello.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, Sunil ji?
Customer: Haan haan. Kaun baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Sir, main aapka na sir Swapnil baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se, senior manager baat kar raha hun. Ji last time aapne Google Meet kiya tha yaad hoga 17 tarikh ko.
Customer: Haan kiya tha kuch nahi aa raha hai yaar, sab ye fake lead aa rahi hai puri, puri, pura mahina khatam ho gaya, pura mahina.
Customer: Sirf puri fake lead aa rahi hai. Kisi bhi lead kaam ki nahi hai.
Customer: Sir, uske samne wale ko ye to bolna chahiye ki haan yaar wo, uska lead dalta hai, kiske liye, website development ke liye ya phir kuch bhi, kisi bhi cheez ke liye dalta hai, digital marketing ke liye jab usko call karte hai to wo kuch aur hi batata hai ki mujhe nahi, main to kuch aur search kar raha tha.
Executive: Abhi aaj ki date mein aapne teen lead consume kari hai sir. Pehla aapne bhara hua hai.
Customer: Teenon, teenon fake hai, teenon.
Executive: Haan, one by one kar lete hain discussion. Pehla aapne karaya Chandrabhan ke.
Customer: Parso, parso bhi jitni lead uthai thi wo sari fake.
Executive: Theek hai, main one by one lena chahunga sir. Main ye keh raha tha ek buyer ka naam tha Chandrabhan WhatsApp marketing ke liye aur ye Peerangut ka buyer tha. To inse kya baat hui aapki?
Customer: Ye bol raha tha ki main kuch product waha pe search kar raha tha isne galat lead dali hai aapko. Mere ko WhatsApp marketing wagera mein kuch nahi karna hai.
Customer: Main to kuch product dekh raha tha, cosmetic product.
Executive: Achha, matlab ye keh rahe the ki aap jo lead ka title hai wo nahi dekh rahe the, kuch alag dekh rahe the ye?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Dusra aapka hai lead title tha I will give instant Google News app approval service.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Buyer tha Delhi ka. To inse kya baat hui hai sir?
Customer: Kiski kahen ki?
Customer: Isme lead title tha na. I will give your domain approval with GoDaddy. Phone hi nahi utha raha hai wo to, phone hi nahi lag raha. Main bol raha hun phone laga ke dekho.
Executive: WhatsApp wagera kiya aapne isko?
Customer: Haan, WhatsApp bhi kiya sab kuch kiya, phone wo jata hai aur wo phir recording karne ka option mangta hai, recording karke chhod do. Aise sab aadhe se zyada phoneon mein aise aata hai. Aadhe se zyada number.
Executive: Sir, wo to voicemail ja raha hoga sir.
Customer: Haan, voicemail. Haan, wo to, wo to, wo to iPhone ka ek feature hota hai. Theek hai, teesra aapka hai ek on page SEO tha Ashriya Reddy, Hyderabad.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan, wo bhi fake lead hai.
Customer: Bole nahi, main to dost ke liye dekh raha tha on page SEO. Yaar dost ki website ke liye dekh raha tha, main aise hi dekh raha tha. Haan, dost ki website ka dhund raha tha wo. Bole mere ko nahi karwana SEO wagera.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapne matlab in sabko contact kar liya hai already?
Customer: Sabko contact kar liya already, already baat bhi kar li hai aur jitni ye do mahine se puri fake lead aa rahi hai. Do mahine se matlab jitne bhi lead mein baat kar raha hun na koi bhi kaam ki lead nahi aa rahi hai. Aisa nahi lag raha hai ki yaar isse business aa jayega ya kuch kaam ki lead hai, ye sab band hi ho gaya hai.
Executive: Sir, last time maine ek cheez aapko boli thi agar aapko yaad hoga website development service wala jo apna discussion hua tha.
Customer: Wo to aa hi nahi rahi hai, wo to aa hi nahi rahi hai.
Executive: To maine aapko ye cheez boli thi sir ki isko matlab ek baar A rank mein convert karne ke liye kuch buyers se agar aap baat bhi kar lenge ya purana kabhi aap, abhi nahi aa raha hai purana.
Customer: Dikhaiye jab na aap unko dikhe jab na website development ki lead dikhe jab na. Abhi mere product kitne hai. Main agar jitne bhi product agar search karta hun na to kuch bhi lead nahi aati hai waha pe. Apne product se agar search karun na sare product se to lead hi nahi nikalti mere paas.
Customer: Waha pe hai hi nahi, lead hi nahi hai. To kya, kya uthaun batao mere ko lead se.
Executive: Aapne pehle kabhi website development service ka pehle to buyer aaya hoga sir. Matlab abhi nahi aa raha hai main manta hun pehle kabhi aaya tha?
Customer: Haan, aate the na lekin.
Executive: To ek kaam kariye chhota sa, ek kaam kariye sir chhota sa kyunki aapka main wahi hai. Aapka ye WhatsApp marketing already aapne bataya hua tha ki itna zyada matlab theek hai karta hun but aisa nahi hai ki focus mera WhatsApp marketing mein hi hai. Aapka tha, main aapka tha ye website development service wala, hai na? To aap ek kaam kariye sir jo purane buyer the na apne jinse pehle kabhi baat hui hogi lead manager mein hoga sir wo detail. Aap ek baar kaam kariye unko jaake ek baar reply zaroor kar dijiye. Kuch bhi reply kar sakte hain jaise ki do you have any requirement right now ya kuch bhi XYZ. Teen se char logon ko agar aap reply kar lete hain na dekhiye B rank se A rank mein convert hone ka ek to ye hota hai ki ya to aapko lead mil jaye uski aur aapne usko consume kar le.
Customer: Purane log kahan pe milenge mujhe?
Executive: Lead manager ka jo humne option diya hai na lead manager mein jab jayenge na to jaise waha pe upar search karne ka option aata hai to waha pe aap ek baar apna normal jaise keyword ke naam se search kar lijiye website development aisa kuch likhenge na to kahin na kahin agar ye keyword match ho gaya waha pe jo buyer ne kuch na kuch to bola hoga buyer ne ki I want to know about website development service aisa kuch to likha hoga usne, hai na? To aisa thoda sa keyword se agar aap type karenge to purane log jo bhi honge jinhone pehle kabhi ek do saal mein bhi baat kari hogi na wo bhi aapko dikhega waha pe. Aap unhi buyer ko ek random message kar sakte hain ki hi sir do you have any requirement right now. To aisa bhi ho jayega ki chalo koi message aapne waisa nahi kiya aap unhi logon ko ek matlab requirement wali cheez puch rahe hain lekin uska fayda ye ho jayega sir jab aap waha pe reply karenge na kyunki is category ka B se A rank banna bahut zaroori hai sir. Maine last time bhi aapko yaad hoga bataya hai kyunki wo aapka main core hai. Hai na? Static hai, dynamic hai jo bhi aap karte hain but ye jo cheez hai kyunki dekhiye WhatsApp marketing software ki main baat karun ye aapko bahut milti hain but usme bhi aap bolte hain ki buyer ka jo response hota hai.
Customer: Wo sab band ho gayi hai ab aana sab band ho gaya, kuch bhi nahi mil raha.
Executive: Band ho gayi?
Customer: Sab zero ho gaya matlab dekho.
Customer: Jo pehle chalta tha na sab zero ho gaya, kuch bhi nahi aata hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Sabhi zero ho gaya, abhi se kuch aa raha hai. Ab main to soch raha hun bas ye file apan chala lete hai, nikal lete hai wo do ek mahine bache hai to wo nikal ke khatam karte hai apan.
Executive: Theek hai aapne.
Customer: Kuch kar nahi paate ho aap, aap logon ko kitna complaint dal ke apan kuch bhi karte hai aap kuch kar nahi paate ho bas excuse dete ho baki aapke backend team se kuch bhi nahi karwa paate ho.
Executive: Sir, dekhiye leads ka to aapko pata hai buyer ki jo requirement hoti hai buyer lead post kar deta hai.
Customer: Dekho aapke paas main bol raha hun do mahine se, do mahine mein aap sahi kar sako to business laake de sako to theek hai nahi to cancel karenge apan hai na.
Executive: Nahi sir uske liye main thoda sa, main samajh gaya, nahi karenge wo bhi main samajh gaya, business milega tabhi karenge free mein to sir koi bhi nahi karta, hai na? Wo mujhe bhi pata hai but iske liye main aapko ek cheez zaroor bolunga jo maine aapko cheez samjhai hai aap please jo aapka main core product hai business ye apna website development service wala ya phir website designing service wala please ye jo keywords hai aap inko search kariye kyunki leads aapko nahi mil rahi hain aapne khud bataya aur wo aati hain to wo already purchase ho jati hongi, hai na? To aap ye lead manager mein jaake in buyer ka keyword search kariye aur please waha pe reply zaroor kar dijiye taaki ye jo category hai boost ho jaye. Boost hogi tabhi buyer aapko dikhega otherwise buyer nahi dikhega kyunki aapke preference mein nahi hai sir ye. Isliye bol raha hun.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai aur ye jo sir calls wagera samne se aa rahi hain aapne do number add karaye hain yaha pe?
Customer: Ek hi number hai wo us number pe nahi aani chahiye call, hai na? Ek hi number pe aani chahiye jo aap jis se aapne baat ki hai 9436.
Executive: Abhi jaise main check kar raha hun na yaha pe mujhe achha do number add hain jisme se ek aapne off kar rakha hai buyer ke liye 70 wala.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai 94 mein hi ja raha hai sir call. Aur koi number nahi hai matlab theek hai 70 mein nahi ja raha hai but.
Customer: Ek hi number hai ye 24 ghanta chalu rehta hai bhai business ka number hai isliye band thodi na karenge.
Executive: Haan nahi wo to hai sir but jab option hai ki matlab jaise main ye nahi bolta ki wo.
Customer: Abhi last mein yahi bolunga aapne jo bola na maine sab apply karke dekh liya aur abhi bhi aapne bola na to wo maine kar diya hai na. Website development ke purani lead ke na unko haay hello kar diya, wapis message bhi bhej diya unko.
Executive: Theek hai. Ab aap dekh lo aapki backend team se agar aapko renewal chahiye to aap sahi karwa do yaar do mahine bache hai nahi to phir.
Executive: Sir, definitely main wahi bol raha hun pehle to ek kaam karte hain jo B rank hai wo A rank mein convert karte hain iske baad jo bhi inquiry aati hai.
Customer: To aapka khatam hi ho jayega, B rank se A rank karoge na to phir aapka khatam ho jayega, matlab ki.
Executive: Sir, dekhiye abhi aap B rank se A rank mein karenge ek do din mein to yahi ho jayega, hai na? Iske baad aapka ye start hoga jo bhi buyer ka hai by list wagera jo post hoti hai wo aapko dikhna start ho jayegi, hai na? Iske baad aap un buyer se baat karenge aur jab aap log 15 buyer se baat karenge aapko automatically pata lag hi jayega ki kuch fark aaya bhi ya phir nahi aaya sir, ye cheez hai.
Executive: Theek hai, maine, maine, maine na us din aapko WhatsApp group pe add kara tha aapne usko join kiya hai?
Customer: IndiaMART wala?
Executive: Kiya hoga, kiya hoga sir.
Executive: Kiya, kiya hua hai na? Ek minute sir, abhi.
Executive: Message kiya maine. Main aapko screenshot de raha hun sir jo jo apna A rank banana hai wo keyword zaroor aap search kar lijiye. Jo B rank mein hai na main uska screenshot de raha hun aapko, theek hai? Aur unko ek baar reply kar lijiyega please.
Customer: Sab kar liya yaar aapne jo bola na un keyword se maine kar liya na website development, e-commerce website development.
Executive: Nahi kar liya aapne abhi reply kara hoga A rank ban jayega aap thoda sa isme time dijiye ek do din ka jaise hi B rank kyunki abhi preference mein hand to hand add nahi hota hai sir. Ye preference mein add ho jane dijiye iske baad check kariye ki kya response hai buyer ka.
Executive: Theek hai? To ye karna hai maine aapko dekhiye bhej bhi diya hai sir WhatsApp wale group pe. Ek baar aap check kar lijiyega sare screenshot maine bhej diye hai jo hume category ko boost karna hai.
Executive: Ek baar rating ka sir main check kar raha hun thoda sa last time bhi aapne halanki bataya tha but phir bhi thoda sa main aapko bolunga ki 3.9 chal raha hai achha hai at least four plus le jaiye sir 4.1, 4.2 kyunki three ki line mein aur four ki line mein ek dekhne ka fark ho jata hai. Waise fark nahi hai point ka hi fark hai lekin ek dekhne ka fark hai na ki ye 4.1 hai aur abhi aapka 3.9 hai almost four hai lekin wo dekhne wali jo cheez hai uske liye main bol raha hun.
Customer: Haan haan wo theek dikhta hai.
Executive: Haan wo please kar lijiyega, theek hai? Iska bhi maine aapko screenshot de diya. To ye aap dekh sakte hain aur baki koi problem hoti hai ye WhatsApp group hai aap mujhe batayenge sir kal parso tak ye jo reply karenge main ek baar check karunga ki aapka ye B rank se A rank mein convert hua ya phir nahi hua. Hua to uske baad phir hum response dekhte hain ki kya milta hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir ji, is call ke baad aapke paas ek feedback ka mil jayega IndiaMART ke liye nahi jayega mere liye jayega sir to apna valuable feedback.
Customer: Wo to main dunga nahi abhi aapke liye aur kisi ke liye nahi dunga jab tak mera kaam nahi hoga tab tak nahi dunga.
Executive: Main samajh gaya nahi sir jaise har instruction.
Customer: Nahi madam meri ye hai ki aap mujhe feedback.
Executive: Nahi madam nahi ye aapne jaise kya jab tak mera kaam aap sahi nahi karke doge to main feedback kyun dun aapko?
Executive: That's that's sir, interaction ka feedback jata hai jaise maine aapse baat kari na to usme ye jata hai ki aapki mujhse baat hui hai aap mujhe apna main IndiaMART ki to abhi baat hi nahi kar raha hun wo feedback mere liye rahega sir.
Customer: Ye to baat hui hai par aapne solution aapne keval mere ko ye precaution bataya ki aapko kya karna hai aapne solution nahi kiya na. Solution karoge to main feedback bhi dunga hai na.
Executive: Solution Sunil ji kaise aap matlab kaise aap iske alawa main aapki kya help kar sakta hun?
Customer: Aapne mere ko resolution bataya wo resolution wo solution mein jab ho jayega jab aap mere se feedback mangna main de dunga aapko.
Executive: Theek hai sir, koi issue nahi hai, thank you, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving only fake leads.

- No useful leads for business growth.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with backend team support.

- Wants website development leads.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested converting B rank to A rank.

- Executive advised contacting old buyers.

- Executive sent screenshots to boost category.

- Executive checked rating and suggested improving it.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and reply to old buyers.

- Executive will check B rank to A rank conversion.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, website development, rating
